title: Design and print custom toys with this kid-safe 3D printer, now under $290
content:
Macworld

Knowing the exact toy that’ll have a kid bursting excitedly during the holidays is always tough. There are so many options, and their tastes change so fast, don’t they?

Instead of trying to find the right toy, you can give any kid on your holiday shopping list the power to choose, design, and print toys with the Toybox 3D Printer. Now through November 16, you can get it for only $289.97 (reg. $419) 

The Toybox was engineered for kids (and even adults!), designed to be as simple as a button press. Just feed in the non-toxic printer filament and scroll through the accompanying Toybox app catalog with hundreds of cool toy ideas.

Then, they can sit back and watch as the Toybox brings the toy to life. Kids and adults alike can print toys based on WB properties like DC Comics, Cartoon Network, Looney Tunes, Hanna-Barbera, and more. Want a unique toy? Toybox’s Creator Space makes it simple for kids to design and print custom toy creations.

Grab the Toybox 3D Printer Starter Bundle, including a 3D printer, printer food, a digital toy catalog, and more, for just $289.97 until November 16 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon is needed to score this exclusive deal!

 

Toybox 3D Printer Starter Bundle

Only $289.97 through Macworld

Prices subject to change.
